name: Napa Plaza Hotel

reviews.text: I booked this hotel with Thomas Cook and stayed a week with my friend, based solely on reviews on this website, and Im so glad I did! I would definatly stay at this hotel again, it was gorgeous. I origionally booked a standard room with no pool view, upon arrival we found we were looking out onto the main road and the room wasnt the standard I was expecting, so the next day we asked to be moved and upgraded to a superior room (all the pool views had gone and I did ask thomas cook to let them know but they obviously did not - so i wont book with thomas cook again but direct with the hotel)
reviews.title: An Oasis of Calm in the middle of everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The superior room was gorgeous and we only paid £15 each to upgrade and we were overlooking tennis courts at the back (allthough did hear the church bells a few times but this wasnt that loud to disturb us!)
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved the Hotel, the Hotel staff, they were so friendly and accomodating, anything you wanted they would try and sort out.
reviews.title: Loved it! Perect in every way! modern hotel!!!

likes.liked: — location, staff, just really modern hotel !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved the breakfast (although we slept in a couple of times and missed it!) we ate lunch at the bar near the pool every day, but we didnt get round to trying dinner there but maybe next time. The Pepper bar was gorgeous, lovely cocktails and good service, and the pool and the whole hotel were just lovely.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurants we visited were, Fiji's (gorgeous chicken green curry) Clarabels (ok - looks very nice but food is nothing special), Bella Pasta (average pasta - not worth the money) Sage (the best meal of the week - gorgeous starters and mains - had the best steak here and presentated beautifully)
reviews.title: Fabulous Contemporary Hotel

likes.liked: — The decor and contemporary style of hotel- very much my taste!
likes.disliked: — The fridge we paid for was hot instead of cold!!! (but that's honestly it!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend anyone to stay at this hotel young or old,the staff were excellent i celebrated my 24th birthday on our second day and there was a birthday cake in our room for me.We never heard any church bells and always had a decent night sleep.I wouldnt rate the breakfast much,not my idea of a decent fry up, more of a boil up! The pool is really nice and we always managed to get sunbeds even when we was down at 1pm!
reviews.title: perfect in every way!

likes.liked: — The pool and gym were great!
likes.disliked: — There was no iron in the room,and couldnt get one for 2 nights.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were v nicely decorated and were kept really nice and clean.Clean sheets and towels every day. Restaurants we would recommend are Yo thai,spice of india in ayia napa square,and definatley try a Greek meat meze. The only restaurant to avoid is Clarabels we went on my birthday and was so disappointed it was overpriced for a dry piece of lamb with raw veg!
reviews.title: The Dogs [--]

likes.liked: — The standard of the Rooms and Public Areas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our fave beach was nissi beach it was beautiful.Overall we had a fantastic holiday and are booking the same place for next year.!!! Hope u enjoy! xxx
reviews.title: Great time at the Napa Plaza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from the Napa Plaza, which we booked after reading the reviews on this web site. Its a great Hotel, clean, tidy and the staff were very helpful - we even had our room upgraded. its location means that you are 5 minutes from the "noisy area" if you go one way, or 5 minutes for the "not noisy area". either way provide you with an excellent choice of nightlife. And at the end of the day, when you go to bed, you can hear nothing. One place to visit is called the Liquid bar, its not on the main street, and to look at, is expensive - but give it a try, reasonable prices, air conditioned, and comfortable. If you want a good meal, visit clarabel restaurant opposite the hotel - the food is good and at a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great staff, Great Holiday
Napa Plaza Hotel cyprus
reviews.text: This hotel is a great base for Ayia Napa as it is very centraly located. It is minutes away from the square with all its nightlife, next door to a park and the monastry and about 10 mins walk away from the fabulous Liminaki beach and marina.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I have just returned from our trip to Ayia Napa. We stayed at the Napa Plaza for a week and thought that this hotel was brilliant. We've always gone self catering before and we thought we might go for a bit of luxury and that's exactly what we got. The lobby is lovely and the reception staff are really helpful and friendly the majority of the time. They did everything they could to help us during our stay.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was really nice. The beds are big, even though we had to push two singles together to make a double. The bathroom was quite small but it was really modern and had a powerful shower and a bath! The maids cleaned our room every day and never once disturbed us whilst we were sleeping, even when we had a lie in. We didn't have a pool view room and our balcony did look out onto a back road but it was so quiet we really didn't mind. We didn't spend much time on it anyway as the pool at this hotel is lovely. It's a great size and was never really busy even at this peak time in the year. It had a friendly atmosphere and we loved spending time there. All the rooms have air conditioning, much needed as it is very hot in Cyprus!
reviews.title: superb hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As for food, we went bed and breakfast and are glad we did. There's loads of choice at the buffet breakfast although we did only make it a couple of times as it finishes at 10am. We also ate at the Yacht pool bar where the food was lovely and the staff friendly. This was also the case in the Cloisters restaurant, The bakery and Chihuahua the mexican restaurant - all part of the hotel.
reviews.title: 12 august....what a hotel!!

likes.liked: — the pool view at night....fantastic!! and the foodwas to die for!

reviews.text: This hotel is in a great location, just off the main street through Ayia Napa. It's a short walk from 'The Square' where the majority of the bars and clubs are and a short walk from the harbour in the opposite direction. It's also right next door to the old monestry which is worth a visit. Even though it's so close to all the action it is still really quiet as it is set back from the road and the glass doors in the hotel block out any noise, you really don't hear anything.
reviews.title: Best in cyprus......well known.....(down point some of the reception staff)

likes.disliked: — the difference between hotel appearance and room appearance

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best bars and clubs - Pepper (part of the hotel) is always really lively and they make really good cocktails - plays loads of dance music though!
reviews.title: Can't fault it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my partner have just returned from the Napa Plaza where we stayed from July 25th to August 5th 2007. We went to the Napa Plaza to celebrate my 21st birthday and like the majority of other reviewers, we absolutley loved it! The hotel itself was beautiful, basic rooms, lovely pool, nice choice of foods and fabulous bar. Pepper Bar which is the bar owned by the hotel offers the most delicious cocktails from any of the bars. The beach which is near by, offers tuna fishing, banana boats, jet ski's and parargliding, which we tried and was the highlight of our holiday. On an evening there are a vast amount of restaurants to choose from including, Indian, Italian and Mexican (which I highly recommend) as well as the more traditional, KFC, Burger King and Pizza Hut, which are literally on the hotel's doorstep. Nighlight is fantastic and there is a choice of cocktail bars and karaoke clubs or night clubs and bars offering live music. Although the nighlife is literally only a few minutes walk away, the hotel is set back just enough so you are not kept awake all night! Other entertainments are also on offer, including shopping, crazy golf and a funfair. This holiday was our best by far because of all that was on offer to us, however, if looking for a cheaper holiday, Aiya Napa is definately not the place!
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I stayed at the Napa Plaza hotel from July 18th-August 2nd 2007 and we had a fantastic time. I picked this hotel based on internet reviews alone and I am so glad we did..it was absolutely great! Looking at other hotels in the area, I would say that the Napa Plaza would be hard to beat and we experienced very little problems during our stay.
reviews.title: Brilliant holiday at the Napa Plaza

likes.disliked: — Lack of air conditioning in lobby and bars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: THE ROOM: We didnt pay extra for pool view because we are two students so would rather spend the $$ on drinks, food etc than a view but it didnt affect our stay at all. The view we had was basically a dirt track with a few parked cars on it...so if you enjoy sitting on your balcony, I would recommend paying a bit extra for a pool view. We hardly spent any time in our room so this was not a problem for us - the time we did spend was to cool down from the heat outside! Also, never heard a sound from pubs, clubs or monestary...
reviews.title: Absolutely Fab!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was a twin room..we had asked for a double bed but it was simply two beds pushed together which was a bit annoying!! Also, the room was very small compared to other hotels I have stayed in but again, this didnt prove much of a problem for us as we were always out during the day anyway. We hired the mini fridge (bit dodgy!) and safe which was cheap..80cents a day. Maids did a great job cleaning the place each day and providing us with new towels, bedsheets etc.
reviews.title: This Hotel is superb and in the perfect location...............

likes.disliked: — Clean but could be cleaner when compared to other 4* hotels on the island.

reviews.title: An amazing getaway
reviews.text: FOOD/DRINK: We stayed in the Napa Plaza on a B&B Rate and I'm glad we did -the restaurants outside the hotel are great. We loved breakfast..sausages, bacon,eggs, potatoes, tomatoes, omelette, crossiants, toast, fruit etc and there was always fresh food available even 10 mins before breakfast ended. We stayed in the hotel once for dinner..£9 each for BBQ buffet but although food was good, I preferred to eat out. Restaurants I would recommend are:

description: The Napa Plaza is a trendsetting integrated lifestyle holiday center designed to provide sensational experiential holidays. What distinguish us is the central prominent location and the “adult appealed” concept, underlined by a stylish, chic and unique, communicative, relaxed and enjoyable environment. The Napa Plaza gives a positive Lifestyle feeling in a relaxing casual atmosphere full of harmony, life's joy (joie de vivre), tolerance, generosity, mutual compassion and individuality. This Lifestyle community helps everyone to find his/her individual way for a sensational experiential stay. In addition to the prominent location, Napa Plaza is distinguished through architecture, cutting edge design and a vast choice of places and services creating a chic and unique character for comfort, service, activities and experiences of the top class.
